about_the_game:
Note: This game requires two players with a working and compatible PC with a microphone. The game does not contain built-in voice chat.

Crew member of a malfunctioning spaceship, you missed the evacuation of the ship and are going straight to your end. Alerted by the imminent collision, you and your partner will have to communicate and help each other in order to get out of here as quickly as possible.
However, your path will be blocked by many puzzles, it's up to you to solve them.

  • Puzzle Madness: Work cooperatively in an escape game in the form of a video game
  • Inspired by games such as: We Were Here Serie, Keep Talking And Nobody Explode, Operation Tango

Communicate

Exchange information with your partner to evolve in the different environments. Look around you, each element can be important.

Solve

Face different riddles and puzzles. Discover the final moments of the ship of the MIRAGE corporation. Fix machines and restore power to get out of there.

Flee

"...don't miss the meeting! Tomorrow 8.00AM, it's the big start!"
It looks like you missed the departure time and it's now too late. How will you escape from this spaceship doomed to annihilation?

name: Out in Space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 32/64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ce jeu nécessite deux joueurs avec un PC fonctionnel et compatible avec un microphone.

short_description: Out In Space is an online cooperative escape game in which you and your teammate will put your communication skills to the test in order to escape from a space wreck doomed to destruction. Will you make it out in space ?
